aboutBody: This template focuses on practical defaults: route-driven structure, localization, and reusable themed UI primitives.
cartItems: {count, plural, =0 {Your cart is empty.} one {You have # item in your cart.} other {You have # items in your cart.}}
featureOneBody: Vite, React, and strict TypeScript configured for fast iteration.
featureThreeBody: Custom typography, rounded components, and atmospheric gradients out of the box.
featureTwoBody: i18next with language detection and runtime language switching.
subtitle: A minimal React + TypeScript starter with i18next and a polished Material UI theme.
title: Build products that speak every language
